text:
Seattle | Onsite | Outreach.io

Join an incredibly fast growing sales SaaS startup that is quickly becoming the operating system for a sales organization. Outreach connects with an organization's CRM, email, and other communication systems and manages their interaction with the customer.

React.js, Go, Rails, and a very modern devops stack on top of AWS. Hiring UI Engineers, Full-stack, and Back-end.

Check out https://outreach.io/company/careers/ or email me directly at gordon@outreach.io.
